It's just a timeless classic. If you can overlook the graphics - you have easy to get used to physics, intriguing world-building, mysteries scattered throughout and lots of action-packed shooting. Replayability is fine I guess, but for that matter I would recommend the sequel. Otherwise - dive in, complete a run, and have fun along the way! It has little to no bugs, system requirements are the same like other 20+ year old games - you get the picture. On frequently big sales and in very money-efficient packs (like the Valve Complete Pack on sales). Highly recommended for FPS and single-player story-rich fans, a must-have for fans of the series ( Half-Life, CS, etc.). 

Score - 10/10

I played this game about a decade ago and remembered very little of the game apart from the fact that I enjoyed it. I played the original version again (prior to trying the Black Mesa) and everything I forgot about the game made playing it again an exciting experience. This game is still very immersive, has plenty of jump scares and great story-telling, and is one of the best games I have ever played, even with its dated graphics. I still highly recommend this game.

大包入的。其实小学就在电脑房玩过。以前盗版没打通过。因为觉得很没劲，感觉还挺难的。二十年过去了，我再此玩起了这款伟大的游戏，正版的。但我依旧玩不进去。这么多人都夸赞的游戏我为何就无法投入进去？苦思冥想之后得出个结论，HL的优点不是我所中意的，剧情？关卡设计？解谜？场景交互？那个时代是翘楚，但从历时这么多年产业发展这些创意已经不新鲜了。而这款游戏其它部分比如射击系统，枪械系统，音效，以及一些其它细节都只能算上平平。这是一个时代的产物。2020年了，它只适合一部分人怀旧，一部分人跟风。

完结撒花。补票结束。仅适合怀旧。
Recommended! It is one of the first FPS games I have ever played and is still good these days.

Half-Life Это крутой боевик созданный в 1998 году. Она не лагает и занимает примерно 0.5 гигабайта. Между определёнными местами короткая загрузка 2-4 секунды. И в ней хорошая графика для 1998 года. Я ставлю [h1] 10 из 10 [/h1]

I absolutely LOVE this game, and I love its sequels even more. However, this game is a lot more difficult then I thought it would be, but I guess you can call it its charm. I highly recommend this for anyone who owns a computer.
EDIT: After playing this for the second time, I see now that this game is a masterpiece. It is a little dated, sure, but once you get used to how the game works it is an absolutely lovely experience.

Extremely good, especially for a game that came out in 1998. Do not let the artstyle fool you: you are no one man army in this game. Be smart. Think before shooting. 

Basically created the idea of storytelling in first person shooters, and the story is incredible even by modern standards. Plenty of replayability, so its well worth the money.
Old but gold. Recommended

Size şimdi burda half life ı övsem klasik dersiniz bu yüzden kötü yanlarını size söyleyeceğim ancak eskiye göre deil yeniye göre o zamana göre çok iyi demek yok : grafik aramayın zaten , save sistemi tarih öncesi , bazen yapacağınız şeyi bulamıyorsunuz oyun bulmaca yönünden zor yönünüzü bile bulamayacağınız yerler var zira ben yaklaşık 1000 kez half life gameplay yazmaya çalışmışımdır , oyunu zor başlatırsanız gerçekten zor ki bu bi eksi deil ama bilin istedim , oyunun bugları çok birkaçtanesini size yazayım : sıkışmak , dünya dışına çıkmak , roket bölümündeki o bug , zaten bu buglar sayesinde oyunu bir saatte bitire bilirsiniz, oyun da kanser olabilirsiniz .... ancak oyun çok iyi kesinlikle oynayın zira oyun oyun dünyasına yön vermiş bir yapım
It makes you FEEL like Gordon Freeman

Игра 1998 года, выдаёт порцию ностальгии.
У неё есть как и плюсы, так и минусы (да даже если они есть, они не заметны).
Геймплей: ... Он тут сделан отлично, и принёс в игровую индустрию много геймплейных фишек, таких как, передвигание предметов, ломка предметов (ящиков, люков).. 10\10
Сюжет: ... Есть люди, которым не очень эта игра нравится сюжетом, по типу, что он скучный. Моё же мнение, тут сюжет хорош, но есть за что поругать... 10\10
Физика: ... Это первая игра, с нормальной физикой, например я могу повторится о том что, тут можно ломать предметы, конечно не все но можно... 10\10
Графика: ... Я хз почему, но графика движка GOLSource меня очень сильно затягивает. 10\10
Итог:
Игра в 1998 порвала игровую индустрию, тут есть всё, и графика, и сюжет, и физика, и разнообразный геймдизайн, по типу, с Чёрной Мезы мы попадаем в "Зен".

It has been forever since I wanted to play this as a kids since I only had orange box. Dream come true.

A classic and a technological marvel of 90's gaming. Sure, some parts haven't aged all that well today (mainly On A Rail and all of Xen) but you need to put yourself into the mindset of someone playing in 1998. The huge set pieces, the frighteningly smart enemy AI, the large and exciting levels. Nothing in the late 90's was like it. Valve set the standard for all their future games with it.

In Half-Life, the enemies are smart and you have to be smarter, or they'll kick your ass and eat you alive. Pick this one up at any price.

Cheers.

Half Life is a very interesting game. The story is slowly revealed to you, and Valve has made some very creative encounters.
However, do note that you will most likely need a walkthrough for a couple of levels, due to there being little to no clues as to what you need to do. 
I got 12 hours for 7 quid out of this game playing on godmode/
Worth it.

Timeless classic. 10/10

Quite entertaining classic - back than it was fantastic, right now it is still decent. For a low price it is still worth a try if you haven't played it yet. Sometimes it is maybe a bit unfair, but quick saving and reloading is fast nowadays so it is not much of an issue.

I recommend this game for the simple reason that it is a classic. Apparently when it came out, it was the sh*t back then, revolutionary in a way. I played it for the sake of playing it, to be able to say "Yeah I played the original Half-Life" but that is all. I had to force myself through the game at times. It is a somewhat buggy game still, where you can randomly get stuck in the wall for example, or the in-game events aren't triggered for some reason which leads you to reload your last save. A 6.5/10 for me at the highest.
